title: NIAMT or NIFFT ranchi mess food
selftext:
Students in NIAMT ranchi are being given such low quality food that even street cat and dogs cannot eat. Giving such food to eat should be a crime against humanity. Don't ever take admission in this college.

[https://www.youtube.com/shorts/fCr0GpdEXvY](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/fCr0GpdEXvY)
